channel.title: Making commands...?
channel.description:
I don't know how to make commands.. I know this is a simple question but I'm not good with coding and editing and stuff. I want to do something like ::mime to give full mime or ::runes to give 5k of each rune (i have working magic on my server so runes are needed)
Please help, anyone.

item.title: Making commands...?
item.dc:creator: @doorhinj doorhinj
item.description:
@doorhinj wrote:

can someone please tell me where to put the code???

Read full topic

item.title: Making commands...?
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

So the code should look like this?

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mime”) {

addItem(3057, 1);
addItem(3058, 1);
addItem(3059, 1);
addItem(3060, 1);
addItem(3061, 1);
sendMessage("Have fun with your mime!");
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Making commands...?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

No he is an idiot:

[quote=“madgamer, post:2, topic:113191”]to make one that give full mime, add this line:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mime") { addItem(3057, 1); addItem(3058, 1); addItem(3059, 1); addItem(3060, 1); addItem(3061, 1); sendMessage("Have fun with your mime!"); }

the first number in the “addItem(,)” is the Item code, 2nd number is the amount.[/quote]

First it is

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mime") {

and when full list ends it ends with a ); for extra ones

Read full topic

item.title: Making commands...?
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

Slight problemo senior… client.java:32053: ')' expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mime") { ^ client.java:32060: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

if you replace the command name, items, and message then yes.

item.title: Making commands...?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

to make one that give full mime, add this line:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mime") { addItem(3057, 1); addItem(3058, 1); addItem(3059, 1); addItem(3060, 1); addItem(3061, 1); sendMessage("Have fun with your mime!"); }

the first number in the “addItem(,)” is the Item code, 2nd number is the amount.

Read full topic
